issue.title: Next version of cloudsim should include a feature "upgrade"

content.raw:
That is an interesting point, and we don't have plans to address it. 
As of CloudSim 1.2, It is not possible for a constellation to "adopt" a running field computer.

Note:
It is important to keep in mind that setup of the field computer should be automated as much as possible, because DARPA will launch the constellations from their own AWS account, and attaching field computers from different accounts will not be supported. Teams will have time set aside to prepare their "new" field computer before running a set of tasks.

work around:
Use ssh to login the simulator and perform ROS, drcsim and gazebo upgrades using apt-get, just like you would on the field computer.
This should breathe new life to old constellations. 

caveat:
This technique won't address changes in constellation network topology, iptables, VPN settings etc.
